channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says Maduro "captured" by U.S. in stunning move
item.description: President Trump said on social media early Saturday that the U.S. struck Venezuela, "captured" President Nicolás Maduro and flew him out of his oil-ri...

item.title: Trump faces quick criticism from Democrats over Maduro capture
item.description: President Trump is already being blasted by congressional Democrats for ordering strikes on military targets in Caracas, as part of an overnight opera...

item.title: Trump brings American interventionism roaring back
item.description: Under the banner of America First, President Trump is attacking countries all over the world. Why it matters: American interventionism is back, in Tru...

item.title: World leaders denounce U.S. operation to capture Maduro
item.description: Countries including Brazil, Colombia, Mexico, Russia and Iran condemned the Trump administration's intervention in Venezuela on Saturday after the U.S...

item.title: Trump's presidential bucket list
item.description: In a race against time to cement his legacy, President Trump has lined up a series of mega-projects with a single deadline — 2028 — and little room fo...

item.title: Tim Walz was a Democratic hopeful. Now, he’s a Republican punching bag.
item.description: The Minnesota governor is seeking a third term amid a welfare probe in his state that has sparked unwanted national attention.

item.title: Marble, ice sculptures and optics: Trump’s remote presidency draws scrutiny
item.description: At Mar-a-Lago, official governance, private business and personal relationships converge.

item.title: Thousands of mail-in ballots could be discounted under new post office policy
item.description: The Postal Service is no longer guaranteeing when it will postmark mail, which could jeopardize some ballots that arrive after Election Day.

item.title: FBI says undercover operation thwarted ISIS-inspired terror attack
item.description: Officials say an 18 year old man contacted an NYPD undercover officer posing as a member of ISIS and discussed staging an attack at a North Carolina g...

item.title: How new protest laws are impacting political demonstrations
item.description: More than a dozen states have passed laws regulating protests in recent years, raising concerns among free-speech advocates.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Trump will again test ‘blame Democrats’ message on the economy — this time at a casino
item.description: President Donald Trump will give a speech in Northeastern Pennsylvania on Tuesday, the first stop in a ‘tour’ where he will talk about affordability c...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
